label: 近衛府
説明文: One of the Six Guards (rokuefu) units that made up the central military institutions of the Heian period; established in 746 by Emperor Shōmu as the jutō toneri and renamed the jutōe by Empress Kōken/Shōtoku in 759; in 765, it was reconstituted as the kon'efu; in 807, it was again renamed, this time becoming the left kon'efu.↓[六衛府、授刀舎人、授刀衛] [HW]
